Ruby.html.title: Ruby
Ruby.html.body: Ruby [TOC] 數列 array = [3,6,9] array.map {|value| value * 20} => [60, 120, 180] 用於物件 hash = {:name => “John”, :age => 30, :phone => “0910111000”} hash.map {|key, value| value } => [“John”, 30, “0910111000”] puts “Hello #{name.capitalize}!” result = 0 array = [2,3,4,5,6] array.each do |value| result = result + value end result => 20 © 2017 Trashman all right reserved，powered by Gitbook修訂時間： 2024-10-14 03:41:08
